articles.content: The Rolling Stones are rereleasing their 1973 LP Goats Head Soup as a deluxe box set featuring rarities, outtakes and alternative mixes from the sessions, a new stereo mix of the original album, a co… [+2720 chars]

articles.author: Rohan Naahar
articles.title: Greyhound movie review: Tom Hanks’ thrilling World War 2 film gives Apple TV its biggest V-Day yet - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Greyhound movie review: Tom Hanks revisits World War 2 in this thrillingly tight survival drama, whose release on Apple TV+ won’t do justice to its excellent action sequences.
articles.content:
